20101224010651.000|20101224010657.000|CC1|I WANT TO GO OUT TO DR. MARTY   
20101224010657.000|20101224010703.000|CC1|McCARY, PHYSICIAN OF JOHN'S

20101224010706.000|20101224010708.000|CC1|HOW DO YOU TAKE A GROWN WOMAN,

20101224010711.000|20101224010712.000|CC1|THAT BIG.

20101224010714.000|20101224010714.000|CC1|SUITCASE?

20101224010716.000|20101224010718.000|CC1|>> THE BODY IS MORE FLEXIBLE    
20101224010718.000|20101224010721.000|CC1|WHEN THERE'S NO SENSE OF        
20101224010721.000|20101224010723.000|CC1|CONTRACTION OR -- IN OTHER      
20101224010723.000|20101224010724.000|CC1|WORDS, WHEN A PATIENT IS NOT    
20101224010724.000|20101224010727.000|CC1|ALIVE, THERE'S A LOT MORE       
20101224010727.000|20101224010729.000|CC1|FLACICITY OF THE MUSCLES.       
20101224010729.000|20101224010731.000|CC1|YOU'D BE AMAZED HOW SOMEBODY CAN
20101224010731.000|20101224010736.000|CC1|MAKE MOVEMENTS IN JOINTS THAT   
20101224010736.000|20101224010739.000|CC1|THEY CAN'T MAKE NORMALLY.       
20101224010739.000|20101224010741.000|CC1|>> WE DON'T KNOW IF THE BODY WAS
20101224010741.000|20101224010743.000|CC1|PUT IN THE SUITCASE WHEN IT WAS 
20101224010743.000|20101224010743.000|CC1|ALIVE OR DECEASED.              
20101224010743.000|20101224010746.000|CC1|CAN YOU TELL AT AUTOPSY,        
20101224010746.000|20101224010748.000|CC1|ESPECIALLY WITH THAT BLACK      
20101224010748.000|20101224010750.000|CC1|PLASTIC BAG OVER THE HEAD, THE  
20101224010750.000|20101224010751.000|CC1|UPPER TORSO.                    
20101224010751.000|20101224010753.000|CC1|CAN YOU TELL IF SHE WAS PUT IN  
20101224010753.000|20101224010754.000|CC1|THAT SUITCASE ALIVE?            
20101224010754.000|20101224010755.000|CC1|>> THE DOCTORS ARE GOING TO BE  
20101224010755.000|20101224010757.000|CC1|ABLE TO TELL A LOT BASED ON THE 
20101224010757.000|20101224010759.000|CC1|MOISTURE INSIDE THE BAG, WHICH  
20101224010759.000|20101224010801.000|CC1|WOULD REPRESENT BREATHING WHILE 
20101224010801.000|20101224010802.000|CC1|THE INDIVIDUAL WAS ALIVE, WHEN  
20101224010802.000|20101224010803.000|CC1|THE BAG WAS PLACED.             
20101224010803.000|20101224010807.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, THE HEAD INJURY, AND  
20101224010807.000|20101224010810.000|CC1|THEN STRANG LACE COMBINATION OF 
20101224010810.000|20101224010812.000|CC1|INJURIES HAS A COMMON PATTERN IN
20101224010812.000|20101224010812.000|CC1|TRAUMA.
